item.title: Simple table sorting with Angular
item.description: View in Plunkr I have a page with tabular data which I want to be able to sort without having to go back to the server. Also a nice-to-have would be the ability to filter the displayed items. Since I’m trying to learn Angular, this seems like an excellent opportunity to try it out. In the controller, the variable items holds the data to be sorted/filtered, while filteredItems is initialized to an empty array.
